General.Name: Changjiang & Jinggong Steel Building Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Changjiang & Jinggong Steel Building (Group) Co., Ltd engages in the design, manufacture, construction, and installation of steel structures in China and internationally. The company offers light and high-rise steel structures, wall materials, and other products. It also provides building materials. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Lu'an, China.
